title: So in love with asswipe
content:
doing the spring cleaning thing - found an old CD with this "Asswipe" font. it's a really great script actually. and I'm thinking of using it on some wedding invites. but I'm wondering where in the world I got it - I'm not sure that I own it, unless I picked it up on some free promo thing some years ago.   
   
can't find it anywhere. who claims this fame eh?
author: tsprowl

comments.content: According to a text file with my copy, it was a free font for 10/96. Design away!

Chanks 'Asswipe Deluxxe' would be 30 US$, according to this page.:   
 [http://www.digitalriver.com/dr/v2/ec\_MAIN.Entry10?xid=295&PN=1&SP=10023&V1=23922&DSP=&CUR=840&PGRP=0&CACHE\_ID=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071034/http:/www.digitalriver.com/dr/v2/ec_MAIN.Entry10?xid=295&PN=1&SP=10023&V1=23922&DSP=&CUR=840&PGRP=0&CACHE_ID=0)   
But, I am not able to find it at the current Chank site..   
   
_( Its still availabe for free download, at other sources.. )_

ah-swee-pay will sound better to the client if they ask what I used on their wedding invites eh? haha   
   
$30 aint' bad at all - but if it was free in 96 then that sounds about right. still I may cover my ah-s

\> ah-swee-pay will sound better to the client if they ask what I used on their wedding invites   
   
Hopefully not what you used their wedding invites FOR.

I believe chank had a free version. The one you purchase is the 'deluxe' version.   
   
But chank's a good guy, so tossing him $30 is a good thing. ;o)
